comment: Obsolete version of ~ sbequ as of 7-Jul-2023. Version of ~ sbequ with disjoint variable conditions, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jan-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
